item.title: minor-project-II-presentation-content
item.description: Henry: Heap Allocator Heap Allocator An allocator maintains the heap as a collection of various-size blocks. Each block is a contiguous chunk of virtual memory that is either allocated or free.

item.title: tt3
item.description: Terminal Tuesdays #3 This week of terminal Tuesday brings you the concept of alias. Sometimes we may need to type long commands for frequently used programs or for doing a task on the terminal, this may get cumbersome in the long run.

item.title: tt4
item.description: This week of Terminal Tuesdays brings you a useful command-line package. Are you one of those who get rusty on Linux commands then skim through –help or man pages or you just need to find the most common use case of that command/program asap.
